sn44.3:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ca sāriputto, āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṁ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
sn44.3:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sāriputtena saddhiṁ sammodi.
sn44.3:1.3: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
sn44.3:2.1: “Kiṁ nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.3:2.4: “Kiṁ panāvuso, na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.3:2.7: “Kiṁ nu kho, āvuso, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.3:2.9: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44.3:2.10: “Kiṁ panāvuso, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.3:2.12: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44.3:3.1: “‘Kiṁ nu kho, āvuso, hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti iti puṭṭho samāno, ‘abyākataṁ kho etaṁ, āvuso, bhagavatā—
sn44.3:3.3: ‘kiṁ panāvuso, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44.3:3.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
sn44.3:3.6: Ko nu kho, āvuso, hetu, ko paccayo yenetaṁ abyākataṁ bhagavatā”ti?
sn44.3:4.1: “Hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, rūpagatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.2: Na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti, rūpagatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.3: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti, rūpagatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.4: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti, rūpagatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.5: Hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, vedanāgatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.6: Na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti, vedanāgatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.7: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti, vedanāgatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.8: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti, vedanāgatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.9: Hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, saññāgatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.10: Na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti, saññāgatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.11: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti, saññāgatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.12: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti, saññāgatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.13: Hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, saṅkhāragatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.14: Na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti, saṅkhāragatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.15: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti, saṅkhāragatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.16: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti, saṅkhāragatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.17: Hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, viññāṇagatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.18: Na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti, viññāṇagatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.19: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti, viññāṇagatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.20: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti, viññāṇagatametaṁ.
sn44.3:4.21: Ayaṁ kho, āvuso, hetu ayaṁ paccayo, yenetaṁ abyākataṁ bhagavatā”ti.
